entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, mentioned as having breakfast with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as having breakfast with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, mentioned as scanning headlines and causing a reaction from Ron and Harry.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: A person who has been arrested and sent to Azkaban for impersonating an Inferius during an attempted burglary.

entities.name: barnabas the barmy
entities.description: A person mentioned in a tapestry on the seventh floor.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A person who has written an essay about Dementors.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: An object that Harry uses to become invisible.

entities.name: inferius
entities.description: An object that Mundungus impersonated during an attempted burglary.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends, as mentioned in the text.
Hermione and Harry are friends, as mentioned in the text.
Mundungus has been sent to Azkaban for impersonating an Inferius during an attempted burglary.
Harry uses the Invisibility Cloak to become invisible.
Mundungus impersonated an Inferius during an attempted burglary.
Harry goes to the seventh floor, where he finds a tapestry of Barnabas the Barmy teaching trolls to do ballet.
Snape wrote an essay about Dementors.
